response.original_title: Reise in die Vergangenheit - Ulli Lommel über seinen Film Haytabo
response.overview: This is a short documentary featurette where Fassbinder superstar turned cult filmmaker Ulli Lommel discusses his directorial debut, Haytabo starring Eddie Constantine (Alphaville). Aside from featuring Lommel talking about the many iconic stars of the film, which include Fassbinder, Constantine, counterculture figure Rainer Langhans, and counterculture sex icon Uschi Obermaier, the short doc features original behind-the-scenes footage of the making of the film.
response.title: Reise in die Vergangenheit - Ulli Lommel über seinen Film Haytabo
